page.title: 20BURWELL AND DISTRICT BUS.
page.content:
When the{Burwell and District Bus {Company closed}down in{1979}a group of people headed by a former driver decided to save and restore one of the {Daimler double-decker}buses.{The Bus {Preservation Society}was then{started. It raises money by raffles, subscriptions and sales stands at various events.The bus is displayed at {Historic Vehicle Rallies}in the summer. A{second B and D coach}is now being restored.
{ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS. {These pages and statistics were {compiled by Seventh Year pupils at {Burwell Village College guided by {their teachers Mr T.Parnell and Miss {J.Lowless.Thanks are due to everyone {who assisted especially parents who {helped supervise field-work.
